snippet: Gov. Rick Snyder is expected to announce on Friday whether he believes Detroit’s finances are so bleak as to require an overhaul from a state-appointed emergency manager.
abstract: Michigan Gov Rick Snyder is expected to announce whether he believes Detroit's finances are so bleak as to require overhaul from state-appointed emergency manager.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Snyder is expected to announce on Friday whether he believes Detroit’s finances are so bleak as to require an overhaul from a state-appointed emergency manager.

headline.main: Michigan: Governor Expected to Rule on Detroit
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Governor Expected To Rule On Detroit
